culture.name: Red Fort
culture.details: Historic fort in Old Delhi, UNESCO World Heritage Site.

culture.name: Qutub Minar
culture.details: Tallest brick minaret in the world.

culture.name: India Gate
culture.details: War memorial dedicated to Indian soldiers.

culture.name: Humayun’s Tomb
culture.details: Precursor to the Taj Mahal, Mughal architecture.

culture.name: Lotus Temple
culture.details: Baháʼí House of Worship, shaped like a lotus.

culture.name: Jama Masjid
culture.details: One of the largest mosques in India, built by Shah Jahan.

culture.name: Raj Ghat
culture.details: Memorial to Mahatma Gandhi, located on the banks of the Yamuna.

food.name: Chandni Chowk Parathas
food.details: Famous paratha street in Old Delhi.

food.name: Karim’s Jama Masjid
food.details: Iconic Mughlai restaurant near Jama Masjid.

food.name: Rajinder Da Dhaba
food.details: Popular street-style non-veg food joint in Safdarjung.

food.name: Bukhara, ITC Maurya
food.details: Legendary fine-dining restaurant serving North-West Frontier cuisine.

food.name: Paranthe Wali Gali
food.details: Famous street in Chandni Chowk known for various stuffed parathas.

food.name: Kuremal Mohan Lal Kulfi Wale
food.details: Renowned for traditional and unique flavored kulfis.

adventure.name: Adventure Island, Rohini
adventure.details: Amusement park with rides and water activities.

adventure.name: Worlds of Wonder, Noida
adventure.details: Theme park and water park near Delhi.

adventure.name: Indian Mountaineering Foundation
adventure.details: Rock climbing wall and mountaineering activities.

adventure.name: Garden of Five Senses
adventure.details: Leisure space with adventure trails and cultural events.

adventure.name: Okhla Bird Sanctuary
adventure.details: Bird watching and nature walks along Yamuna.

adventure.name: Sanjay Van
adventure.details: Large forested area in South Delhi popular for trekking and nature walks.

adventure.name: Ridge Area
adventure.details: Hilly forested area ideal for hiking and birdwatching.

shopping.name: Dilli Haat
shopping.details: Craft bazaar with food stalls from all Indian states.

shopping.name: Connaught Place
shopping.details: Iconic shopping and business district with colonial architecture.

shopping.name: Chandni Chowk
shopping.details: Historic market known for traditional goods and food.

shopping.name: Select Citywalk, Saket
shopping.details: Modern shopping mall with international brands.

shopping.name: Lajpat Nagar Central Market
shopping.details: Popular market for clothes, accessories, and street food.

shopping.name: Janpath Market
shopping.details: Famous for handicrafts, souvenirs, and ethnic wear.

nature.name: Lodhi Gardens
nature.details: Beautiful park with historic tombs and lush greenery.

nature.name: Deer Park
nature.details: Popular park with deer enclosures and walking paths.

nature.name: Nehru Park
nature.details: Large urban park known for cultural events and open-air concerts.

nature.name: Yamuna Biodiversity Park
nature.details: Protected area conserving native flora and fauna of Yamuna.

nature.name: Sanjay Lake
nature.details: Artificial lake with boating and picnic spots.

nature.name: Aravalli Biodiversity Park
nature.details: Hilly forest park with walking trails and diverse plant life.

museums.name: National Museum
museums.details: Extensive collection of Indian art and artifacts.

museums.name: Gandhi Museum
museums.details: Museum dedicated to the life and legacy of Mahatma Gandhi.

museums.name: Crafts Museum
museums.details: Showcases traditional Indian handicrafts and textiles.

museums.name: Rail Museum
museums.details: Exhibits historic locomotives and railway memorabilia.

museums.name: Indira Gandhi Memorial Museum
museums.details: Museum in the former residence of Indira Gandhi.

museums.name: Nehru Memorial Museum & Library
museums.details: Dedicated to India's first Prime Minister, Jawaharlal Nehru.

spiritual.name: Akshardham Temple
spiritual.details: Massive Hindu temple complex with exhibitions and gardens.

spiritual.name: Birla Mandir
spiritual.details: Elegant Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu and Goddess Lakshmi.

spiritual.name: Jama Masjid
spiritual.details: One of the largest mosques in India.

spiritual.name: Gurudwara Bangla Sahib
spiritual.details: Prominent Sikh house of worship with a sacred pond.

spiritual.name: ISKCON Temple
spiritual.details: Temple dedicated to Lord Krishna with cultural programs.

spiritual.name: Chhatarpur Temple
spiritual.details: One of the largest temple complexes in India.

nightlife.name: Hauz Khas Village
nightlife.details: Trendy area with bars, cafes, and live music venues.

nightlife.name: Connaught Place
nightlife.details: Bustling commercial hub with pubs and restaurants.

nightlife.name: Cyber Hub, Gurugram
nightlife.details: Modern nightlife destination with clubs and eateries.

nightlife.name: Janpath and Khan Market
nightlife.details: Upscale area with chic bars and lounges.

nightlife.name: Saket Select Citywalk
nightlife.details: Shopping mall with multiplex and dining options.

nightlife.name: The Piano Man Jazz Club
nightlife.details: Live jazz performances and cocktails in a cozy setting.
